Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lifetime \Life"time`\ (l[imac]f"t[imac]m`), n. The time that life continues. [1913 Webster]
lifetime n : the period during which something is functional (as between birth and death); "the battery had a short life"; "he lived a long and happy life" [syn: {life}, {lifespan}]
